tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My daughter was 7 days old when we started her treatment with Dr. Prashanth Inna at Manipal Hospital, HAL Airport Road. in our first visit itself, he was very clear about the problem and told us the complete process of treatment and left us with no questions in our mind. He is the best in treating the clubfoot deformity..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Prasanth Inna is Messanger of Almighty for us. He saved the life of our 3y6m old daughter who had suffered through right hand elbow joint fracture and thereafter infection along with Osteomylitis and Septic Arthritis because of the previous surgery of K-wire fixation here in West Bengal. Dr Inna recovered our baby from that situation. ** ** **** ** *** *** ******** ********** *********** ******** ***** **** **** ********* ********* *********** ****** *******
Manipal did not respect the appointment made via practo , there is no benefit of booking an appointment as i have to book a walkin only

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is one to be avoided at any cost. Took my son there for an opinion. During the first visit he put on an act and made us believe that he is genuinely concerned. Based on his recommendation, we paid a second visit yesterday. **** *** * *** *** *** ******* ********* ** ********. He didn't even have the coutesy to explain and just wanted us to leave ASAP after paying up. And he recommended surgery for a 5 year old kid *** * ***** ****** ***** Please stay away from this man.

Dr Prashath Inna is an angel. My daughter was diagnosed with congenital hip dislocation. Now after the surgery she is  healthy and happyly running around. He won't suggest any xrays or tests
Unnecessarily. Such a darling doctor, indeed a messenger from Almighty.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Prashant is the born paediatric specialist..he is so good with kids and understands and asses the real problem..in our son's case he was so kind and followed up with all the test results and directed us to the correct treatment....feel so releived when we meet such a caring doctor..

Very sweet doctor, amazing with children.
One look at the xray & the arm he was able to diagnose the issue,
Seems to have good knowledge & very patient.
The diagnosis was very well explained by the doctor. Also, the treatment was detailed *** ********** We are happy and satisfied. He is definitely recommended.

I had bad experience of hospital. Staffs are ruthless and non cooperative. I am chasing them to provide the copy of bill and they said you give your email id. Now when try to call them no body give correct answer. Today I spoke with Chitra and Roopa but in next call they were disappeared. Appreciate board of directors to look into this kind of irregularities

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Prashant was very precise with the diagnosis and the treatment of my daughter. We saw multiple doctors before meeting Dr. Prashant and none was able to diagnose  the issue. Dr. Prashanth could find the cause and realized the urgency of the situation. My daughter underwent a surgery when she was only 3 weeks old. Dr. Prashanth was extremely patient and explained every aspect of the treatment so well. We will always be grateful to him.

Good doctor.. Just visited now for my sons shoulder fracture.. treate
d well.. Good attitude.  Fee Rs 400 And for Xray 300. open Till 9 Pm

Very precise diagnosis
Had knee and ankle pain. Got cured in 3 days after showing here.. without x ray he diagnosed
After reaching hospital we came to know that Dr.Prasanth Inna is pediatrics.so we can't follow up with him...After that we have to check up with the doc available at that time

Great, heard patiently and understood the issue and explained well too.
Liked his approach and communication.

Very caring and quite impressive,  my daughter had an elbow pullout,  which we were not even aware,  thinking that it's a fracture. Within 2 minutes doc was able to identify and rectify it. Great pediatric orthopedic
Wife had backpain. He did diagnose well and figured that it was just the muscle spasm. Not related to ortho. Gave good tips and nice medication.
Doctor was more busy in taking personal calls than investing time on consulting for the patient come from far by aying 1400 for consultation
My 1 and Half year old daughter is suffering from hypotonia and doctor advised me well. He was patient enough to answer all my queries.
He explained why it happens and precautions we need take so tht it Doesn't repeat..he didn't give any un necessary check ups....I recommend Dr Prashant
Very friendly with kids.He has explained the condition and was available on phone to clear some doubts.I will recommend him
